
# -------------------------------
# Mathematical Operators
# -------------------------------

20 + 20        # Addition
30 - 20        # Subtraction
2 ^ 5          # Exponentiation (Power)
20 * 20        # Multiplication
20 / 20        # Division
sqrt(25)       # Square root
log2(10)       # Logarithm base 2
log10(100)     # Logarithm base 10
log2(5) + log10(8) / 5   # Combined expression
abs(-45)       # Absolute value
floor(4.5)     # Round down
ceiling(1.2)   # Round up


# -------------------------------
# Defining Variables
# -------------------------------

A1 <- 50       # Numeric variable
A2 <- 'salam'  # Character variable
A3 <- 10       # Numeric variable
A4 <- A1 + A3  # Arithmetic using variables

class(A1)      # Check type of A1
class(A2)      # Check type of A2
print(A4)      # Print result

a = 10         # Alternative assignment style
b <- 10        # Preferred assignment in R
a != b         # Logical comparison (not equal)


# -------------------------------
# Vectors
# -------------------------------

x <- c(1, 2, 5, 3, 9, 50)   # Create a numeric vector
x
length(x)                   # Vector length
x[3]                        # Access 3rd element

x <- x[-3]                  # Remove 3rd element
x

# Append new values
x <- append(x, c(55, 88))
x
class(x)

# -------------------------------
# Factors
# -------------------------------

v <- c(1:100)               # Numeric vector
v <- factor(v)              # Convert to factor
v

m <- c('q', 'w', 'e', 'w', 'e', 'q')
m <- factor(m, labels = c('qqq', 'www', 'eee'))
m

# -------------------------------
# Lists
# -------------------------------

u <- list('salam', 12, TRUE)  # Create a list
u
class(u)
'salam' %in% u                # Check membership

p <- rep(c('Tumor', 'normal'), times = 10)   # Repeat pattern
p

g <- seq(from = 0, to = 100, by = 5)         # Sequence
g

# -------------------------------
# Matrices
# -------------------------------

l <- matrix(1:100, nrow = 25, ncol = 4)      # Create a matrix
l

dim(l)         # Dimensions
l[3, 4]        # Element at row 3, col 4
l[3, ]         # Entire row 3
l[, 3]         # Entire column 3
ncol(l)        # Number of columns
nrow(l)        # Number of rows
length(l)      # Total elements

# Add a new column
d <- c(26:50)
l <- cbind(l, d)
dim(l)

# Remove column 5 and row 10
l <- l[, -5]
l <- l[-10, ]
dim(l)

# -------------------------------
# Data Frames
# -------------------------------

t  <- c(1:100)
t2 <- c(101:200)
H <- data.frame(t, t2)
View(H)

# List containing multiple object types
t3 <- list('salam', a, H)
View(t3)

# Help / documentation
?dim
